com.receiver2d.engine

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.receiver2d.engine.World
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class World
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Holds all of the game information for a particular world, including scenes, entities, and more low-level stuff such as resources (loaded dynamically when transitioning to new worlds).
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      ArrayList<Scene> scenes
      A list of scenes contained by the current world.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      World() 
      World(String name)
      Loads a world into memory and gives it a particular name.

    • Method Detail

      • setScene

        public void setScene(Scene scene)
        Sets the scene to be the current.
        Parameters:
        scene - The current scene.

      • addScenes

        public void addScenes(Scene... scenes)
        Takes n scenes and adds them to the world. This does not update the current scene of the world, however.
        Parameters:
        scenes - Scenes to add.

      • getCurrentScene

        public Scene getCurrentScene()
        Gets the currently-running scene of this world.
        Returns:
        The current scene of the world.

      • addResource

        public void addResource(R2DResource res)
        Adds a resource to be loaded when the world is loaded. This differs from adding the resource to a particular scene, which would only be loaded when that scene is loaded.
        Parameters:
        res - The resource to add.

      • getResources

        public ArrayList<R2DResource> getResources()
        Gets the currently loaded/unloaded resources in the world, but not in an individual scene.
        Returns:
        The list of resources.

      • getUUID

        public String getUUID()
        Gets the unique user identifier for this world.
        Returns:
        A representation of this unique identifier.

      • setName

        public void setName(String name)
        Renames the world.
        Parameters:
        name - The new name

      • name

        public String name()
        Gets the name of this world.
        Returns:
        The name of this world.
